data.name: RawDataViewShow
data.comment: Context menu item to show raw data view

data.name: RawDataViewHide
data.comment: Context menu item to hide raw data view (not currently used, kept for future)

data.name: ContextMenuMoreTools
data.comment: Context menu submenu label for additional tools

data.name: RawDataViewMarkdownLabel
data.comment: Label for the markdown source panel in raw data view

data.name: RawDataViewHtmlLabel
data.comment: Label for the generated HTML panel in raw data view
